response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, it is valued at $12,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. We believe this is an opportunity not only to enhance your experience but also to make a wise investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
